title: Welcome to Fall 2024 Semester
content: Welcome to the Fall 2024 semester! We're excited to have you back. Please check your course schedules and ensure all prerequisites are met. Orientation sessions will be held on September 1st.
author: Dr. Sarah Johnson

title: New Research Opportunities Available
content: The Department of Data Science is offering research assistant positions for qualified students. Applications are now open for Spring 2024 projects in machine learning and AI.
author: Prof. Mike Chen

title: Important: Library Hours Update
content: Due to maintenance work, the main library will be closed on September 15th and 16th. Digital resources will remain available through the online portal.
author: Library Administration

title: CS301 Midterm Schedule
content: Midterm examination for CS301: Web Development and Backend Systems will be held on October 5th, 2024 from 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM in Room A201.
author: Alex Rodriguez

title: Career Fair 2024
content: Join us for the Annual Tech Career Fair on September 28th! Meet representatives from top tech companies including Google, Microsoft, and Amazon. Registration required.
author: Career Services
